Documentation¶

class reamber.algorithms.analysis.playField.parts.PFDrawBpm.PFDrawBpm(decimalPlaces: int = 2, color: str = '#cf6b4a', xOffset: int = 0, yOffset: int = 0)¶

Bases: reamber.algorithms.analysis.playField.parts.PFDrawable.PFDrawable

__init__(decimalPlaces: int = 2, color: str = '#cf6b4a', xOffset: int = 0, yOffset: int = 0)¶

Draws Bpms on the field

Parameters

  • decimalPlaces – The number of decimal places to display

  • color – The color of the text

  • xOffset – Padding from the right, useful if you have multiple text drawables overlapping

  • xOffset – Padding from the right, useful if you have multiple text drawables overlapping

draw(pf: PlayField) → PlayField¶
